artist: After Nicolas Poussin; William Marshall Craig; Peltro William Tomkins; Published by Longman, Hurst, Rees, Orme, and Brown London; Published by Cadell and Davies; Published by J. White & Co.
description:
two images printed on one sheet; Baptism: landscape with John the Baptist baptising Jesus who is kneeling before him; crowd of people around them; dove above Christ's head

Confirmation: several kneeling Christians in foreground; priest seated at left anointing them with chrism; large group observing; in a church interior
marks:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscriptions

above  See Inscription
title: Baptisim / Confirmation
